text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text: I'll state my conclusion――

text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
Suspensory Desmitis in the right leg. And it's quite severe. 
For the time being, racing will probably not be possible.

『I feel pain in my leg』. That was what Cesario had 
told me and so we headed to the hospital……and now 
the test results had been announced.

text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
As for recovery――it will likely take around a year, minimum. 
In the worst case……a full recovery might not be……

――! ……Cesario……It'll be fine. 
It'll be fine so……stay strong.

――! ……Cesario……It'll be fine. 
It'll be fine so……stay strong.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: …………Yes. Thank you……very much.

For an Uma Musume, this was almost the worst thing 
that could happen…… No matter how much I tried to 
encourage her, she wouldn't stop shaking.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I……might not be able to run ever again. 
Even if I work hard and focus on recovering.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I didn't think a day like this would ever come…… 
What should I do from now on……?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Training, racing……just "running"…… 
It was precious……or rather, it was my everything……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The joy, the sorrow……it was all a part of running. Not being 
able to do that was unthinkable, I never once thought about it……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(My first major race…… 
The favorite…… And this amount of pressure feels comfortable!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Now, I just need to run as fast as I can! 
First, before the Triple Tiara, Fuu――!!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I won't let you! I can't afford to fall behind! 
Even if it's you, Kraft, this 『Oka Sho』――!)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Those days, that passion, all the emotions that are 
part of running, all of it will be in the past……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
If that's what happens then…… 
I'm sure I'll regret it. But even then……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Why……why is my heart so calm?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I……accomplished so much. For the 『Oaks』 I trained with Kris S-san, 
and was able to win by improving my running. And on top of that――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Japan's first――American G1 victory. 
As an Uma Musume, I've been able to achieve unimaginable glory.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The time spent up until now, has been the happiest of my life. 
With Trainer, Kraft, King-san, surrounded by so many emotions……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I've accomplished everything I wanted. 
I've obtained everything I wanted…… That's right, I……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I feel fulfilled……completely.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I feel so very fulfilled. It hurts not being able to run…… 
But, as long as I still have all these memories……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: In that case, after this, I……

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text:
Cesario! 
Teach us! Teach us how to run!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure I can do this. I'll be able to smile, and do something new…… 
something that I thought of doing someday, I can aim for it now.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
This injury……can definitely become the starting point. 
For us――to move forward.
And then――the next morning.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, Kraft, I have something I want to talk about. 
I'd like you to hear me out. I……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
From now on, I'd like to focus on recovery 
and distance myself from racing.
……Eh?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario……

Time came to a stop. Both Rhein Kraft and I were frozen, 
unable to speak. But……Cesario was still smiling gracefully.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I've spent a lot of time thinking about it. 
About everything I've done, and also what I want to do next.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I still want to run. But, since there's 
a chance this injury might not fully heal, when 
I started thinking about what I should do next……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I realized there are things other than running that 
I can do. I've already received more than enough……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I have absolutely no regrets because the time I've spent 
was the best in my life. With Trainer and Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Cesario…… 
I see…… So that's what you've been thinking about……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But even then……even then I still……want to run together 
with you again! I really want to run, you know? But……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
There's been something bothering me this whole time. 
Cesario, since you've come back from America……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
You haven't switched on, to that other dignified 
Cesario. The whole time you've been gentle, and 
haven't once switched to your racing mindset, right?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Of course, there's your injury but…… 
I wondered if something had changed inside of you, Cesario.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
You've experienced so many things……that maybe your feelings, 
have changed, that you now want to do something else……

She wants to do something else? 
Cesario, did you have anything in mind?

She wants to do something else? 
Cesario, did you have anything in mind?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… It's something I've talked with Kraft about often. 
And with Trainer and King-san just a little. Really, I……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I want……to be more involved in the training process.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I want to help raise the younger Uma Musume. 
Raise them, and then help them race.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's the path that Kraft and I created. 
The Unorthodox Double Crown, and challenging America.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And from now on, Kraft will continue to help create 
that path. The Unorthodox Triple Crown, and a place 
where Tiara Musume can carry on in the Senior class.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The more and more I think about it, 
the more and more this feeling grows.

Cesario……are you really okay with that? You've thought 
it through? If you're forcing yourself to say this then……

Cesario……are you really okay with that? You've thought 
it through? If you're forcing yourself to say this then……

There's no need to hold yourself back. We'll 
help you in any way we can. If you want to run, 
then you'll definitely be able to run again.

There's no need to hold yourself back. We'll 
help you in any way we can. If you want to run, 
then you'll definitely be able to run again.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Run again…… That's true. If my injury heals, then definitely…… 
But I'm not holding myself back. ……This is how I truly feel.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, if you think I'm making a mistake, please tell me. 
Just tell me 『You're being naive. Open your eyes』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: What……do you think?

It's a difficult choice. Cesario was an Uma Musume that had won the 
『Oaks』 and 『American Oaks』. After that, her future life choices……

If she could make a comeback, then I'm sure she'd 
attain even more glory. She could accomplish anything……
Cesario……I want……
choice_data_list: To help you with the dream you want most

text_block_list.text: Cesario……I want……
choice_data_list: To help you with the dream you want most

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Okay

I can't stop her. It was a trainer's job 
to support their Uma Musumes' dreams.
On that day, as a team――we made the biggest decision we ever had.
On that day, as a team――we made the biggest decision we ever had.

The bus had arrived. Cesario boarded, 
she was heading faraway in to the countryside.

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Cesario～, take care!

text_block_list.name: Single-knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
You might be busy, but contact me on 
Umasta every now and then, okay?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I've been in your care, everyone. To start with, 
I need to do my best to adapt to my new environment.

Cesario had been assigned to a small local Uma Musume school 
to help take care of the children. And while recuperating, 
she would consider whether or not to return to the academy.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, don't forget. Whereever you go and 
whatever you do――you're a part of our team. Got it?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: King-san……Yes……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, someday, I want the girls 
that I raise to join Team <Ascella>

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No, maybe it would be more fun to run against 
your team as rivals? If so…… then, maybe…… Fufu.

Yeah, I'll be looking forward to it. If it's a girl 
taught by Cesario then, either way it'll be great.

Yeah, I'll be looking forward to it. If it's a girl 
taught by Cesario then, either way it'll be great.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……Cesario 
I……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best to get that Unorthodox Triple Crown. 
Enough for Cesario's part too……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Kraft…… Yeah, I believe in you. 
If it's Kraft, then for sure……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario……!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Kraft, let's meet again.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: In that 『Future we always dreamed of』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario!!

An irreplaceable friend departs. The conclusion of the 
story of these two that ran the Triple Tiara――

This autumn, everything was entrusted 
to Rhein Kraft. Our remaining ace.
